member.name: T:Ship.Ses.Transmitter.WebApi.Controllers.v1.FhirIngestController
member.summary: Allows EMRs to submit FHIR-compliant resources into the SHIP SES platform.

member.name: M:Ship.Ses.Ingestor.Api.Helper.SafeMessageHelper.Sanitize(System.String)
member.summary: Sanitizes a string for safe use in logs or user-facing messages by removing control characters like CR, LF, and tabs.
member.returns: A sanitized version of the input string.

member.name: M:Ship.Ses.Ingestor.Api.Helper.SafeMessageHelper.Sanitize(System.Object)
member.summary: Sanitizes any object by converting to string and applying sanitization.
